content: alto these words of yours grabbed me and made me sit down and take a breath. They soothed my spirit — they spoke to my soul — I honestly think this is one of your best — and that is saying something — phew! This is going on my wall to be treasured — thank you. You truly have a gift — I stand in ovation. Connection Souls breaking free of wordly tethers To embrace in an exquisite dance So clear, so pure, so true, so deep That they resonate with profound synchronicity
